text: Bradley Darryl "BD" Wong (born October 24, 1960) is an American actor. Wong won a Tony Award for his role as Song Liling in M. Butterfly. Wong is known for his role as Dr. George Huang on Law & Order: Special Victims Unit, Dr. Henry Wu in the Jurassic Park franchise, his role in Mr. Robot, and as Li Shang from the Disney animated movie Mulan. Wong appeared in the TV series Gotham as Hugo Strange. Wong is openly gay. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from California Category:LGBT actors Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: BD Wong
